name: Ignition Beast Missile
text: If this card is in your hand: You can discard 1 card; Special Summon this card. If this card is sent to the GY for the Summon of an "Ignition Beast" monster: You can banish this card; inflict 1500 damage to your opponent, and if you do, take 2000 damage. You can only use each effect of "Ignition Beast Missile" once per turn.
